publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6053 Rob Gibson: Historic Progress at Ross County FCâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the players, coaches and everyone connected with Ross County Football Club on its stunning victory of two goals to one against Hibernian Football Club in the quarter-finals of the Active Nation Scottish Cup; further applauds the sell-out crowd for making an extra special atmosphere on an extra special night in Dingwall; considers that this victory is a monumental result for football in the Highlands and Islands, and wishes all those connected with the club the best of luck against Celtic Football Club in the semi-final at Hampden and for the rest of the season. Supported by: Dave Thompson*
S3M-6053 Historic Progress at Ross County FC (lodged on 24 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*, Brian Adam*, George Foulkes*
